update.value:
{
    "unit_code": "UN124",
    "unit_name": "Liter",
    "base_unit_id": "",         // optional, use the ID of an existing base unit or null
    "operator": "+",
    "operation_value": 200
}

{
  "name": "roceket",
  "number": "123456789",
  "details": "Sample details about the account.",
  "balance": "1000",
  "status": "1"  // or "inactive" based on your requirements
}

{
  "name": "roceket",
  "number": "123456789",
  "details": "Sample details about the account.",
  "balance": "1000",
  "status": "1"  // or "inactive" based on your requirements
}

{
    "trx_id": "TRX123456",
    "type": "debit",  // Replace "credit" with actual value from TransactionTypeEnum
    "reference": "Invoice #12345",
    "note": "Payment for services updated",
    "amount": 1500.00,
    "payment_method": "bank",  // Replace "bank" with actual value from PaymentMethodEnum
    "operation_type": "purchase",  // Replace "purchase" with actual value from TransactionOperationTypeEnum
    "account_id": "1",
    "user_id": 1,  // This should be an existing user ID
    "status": "completed"  // Replace "completed" with actual value from PaymentStatus
}
